message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm thinking $150 would be a fair price, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking $120 would be a better price for me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit to $135, but I can't go any lower. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $125 would be a good price for me.
